trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationNeighbor" /> class contains information about a replication neighbor of an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance" /> or <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController" /> object.
Gets the number of replication failures since the last successful replication cycle.
The number of failed replication attempts from this source since the last successful replication attempt.
trans-unit.target: 失敗したレプリケーションの数は、このソースから最後の正常なレプリケーション試行しようとします。

trans-unit.source: If no previous attempt was successful, the return value is the number of failed replication attempts since the source was added as a neighbor.
trans-unit.target: 前回の試行が成功したない場合は、ソースが、近隣ノードとして追加されたため失敗したレプリケーション試行の回数は、戻り値です。

trans-unit.source: Gets the time of the last replication attempt from this source.
The time of the last replication attempt.
trans-unit.target: 最後に試行したレプリケーションの時刻。

trans-unit.source: If no replication attempt occurred, the value is zero.
trans-unit.target: レプリケーションの試行が発生していない場合、値は 0 です。

trans-unit.source: Gets the time of the last successful replication cycle from this source.
The time of the last successful synchronization.
trans-unit.target: 前回成功した同期の時刻。

trans-unit.source: If no replication succeeded, the value is zero.
trans-unit.target: レプリケーションが成功した場合されません、値は 0 です。

trans-unit.source: Gets the message that is associated with the last replication attempt from this source.
The message that corresponds to the last replication attempt.
trans-unit.target: 対応するメッセージが最後のレプリケーションをしようとします。

trans-unit.source: If the last attempt succeeded, the value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 前回の試行が成功した場合、値は空の文字列がします。

trans-unit.source: Gets the error code that is associated with the last replication attempt from this source.
The error code for the last replication attempt.
trans-unit.target: 最後に試行したレプリケーションのエラー コード。

trans-unit.source: If the last attempt succeeded, the value is ERROR_SUCCESS.
trans-unit.target: 前回の試行が成功した場合は error_success を返します。

trans-unit.source: Gets the partition name for this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationNeighbor" /> object.
The name of the partition for this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationNeighbor" /> object.
trans-unit.target: このパーティションの名前<see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationNeighbor" />オブジェクト。

trans-unit.source: Gets the attribute and object settings for this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationNeighbor" /> object.

A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationNeighbor.ReplicationNeighborOptions" /> value that contains the attribute and option settings for this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationNeighbor" /> object.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationNeighbor.ReplicationNeighborOptions" />この属性とオプションの設定を含む値<see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationNeighbor" />オブジェクト。

trans-unit.source: Gets the invocation identifier that was used by the replication source server in the last replication attempt.
The invocation identifier that was used by the replication source server in the last replication attempt.
trans-unit.target: 前回の複製の試行でレプリケーションの移行元サーバーで使用された呼び出しの識別子です。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the replication source server.
The name of the replication source server.
trans-unit.target: レプリケーション元サーバーの名前。

trans-unit.source: Gets the transport type that was used for replication.
A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType" /> enumeration value that indicates the transport type that was used for the replication connection.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType" />レプリケーション接続用に使用されるトランスポートの種類を示す列挙値。

trans-unit.source: Gets the update sequence number (USN) value for the last successful replication cycle.
The USN value for the last successful replication cycle.
trans-unit.target: 最後の正常なレプリケーション サイクルの USN 値。

trans-unit.source: If no replication succeeded, the value is zero.
trans-unit.target: レプリケーションが成功した場合されません、値は 0 です。

trans-unit.source: Gets the update sequence number (USN) of the last object update that was received.
The USN of the last update that was received.
trans-unit.target: 受信した最後の更新の USN です。
